This document is the API specification for the General SQL Parser Java version.

TGSqlParser always used first to parse/analyze input SQL script, then various SQL statements represented by classes in gudusoft.gsqlparser.stmt package were ready for further analysis. The classes in gudusoft.gsqlparser.nodes package represent SQL clauses inside SQL statement which includes detailed information about SQL structure.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
gudusoft.gsqlparser, gudusoft.gsqlparser.stmt, gudusoft.gsqlparser.nodes
